mapper.select: select s.StationName, sst.* from ScoreShortTime sst left join Station s on s.StationCode = sst.StationId where sst.HappendTime >= #{startTime} and sst.HappendTime <= #{endTime} and FcstType = #{fcstType} and (SUBSTRING(sst.StationId, 1, 2) = '58' and (s.County is null or LEN(RTRIM(LTRIM(s.County))) = 0))
